plot: My thesis project is a 3D animation about a trip back to the unpleasant memory of a fish-like character. He goes back and travels in time to review the things he did in the past but somehow got out of his memory.
title: After Thought
plot_es: My thesis project is a 3D animation about a trip back to the unpleasant memory of a fish-like character. He goes back and travels in time to review the things he did in the past but somehow got out of his memory.
